title: Ep 155: Red Lipstick Rules
itunes:title: Ep 155: Red Lipstick Rules
itunes:subtitle: Rachel Felder, author of the new book Red Lipstick: Ode to a Beauty Icon, shares the fascinating history of the world's most talked-about lip color, from the ingredient Egyptians used to redden their mouths and the Lipstick Wars of the 20...
description:
Rachel Felder, author of the new book Red Lipstick: Ode to a Beauty Icon, shares the fascinating history of the world's most talked-about lip color, from the ingredient Egyptians used to redden their mouths and the Lipstick Wars of the 20th century to the secret story behind MAC's Russian Red. Before that: We discuss Glamsquad and other on-demand beauty services; hair-saving shower filters; and Dollar General's new makeup collection.


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit 

Twitter: @fatmascara 

Email: info@fatmascara.com 

Website: fatmascara.com

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
